text: “Ezɨ gumazitam ingangarir amizir kɨnitam ikɨ, egh a gumazir igharazim bagh amizir kam amangasa akam akɨri, ezɨ gumazim a givezezir puvatɨ. Eghtɨ gumazir amizir kamɨn garim, amizir kam ko dakutɨ, ia aning inigh kotiamɨn mangɨ. Egh ia aning mɨsueghtɨ, aning aremeghan markɨ. Guizbangɨra, amizir kam a gumazir an garimɨn ingangarir amizir kɨnim.
